title: Climate change is shifting productivity of fisheries worldwide

title_detail.value: Climate change is shifting productivity of fisheries worldwide

summary: Fish provide a vital source of protein for over half the world's population, with over 56 million people employed by or subsisting on fisheries. But climate change is beginning to disrupt the complex, interconnected systems that underpin this major source of food.
